property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, choose a player. That player puts their hand on the bottom of their deck and draws the same number of cards. Then that player puts all their shields on the bottom of their deck, then adds the same number of cards to their shields face down.

property.value: Very Rare

card.name: Q.Q.QX. / Final Burial Five Sense Down

property.name: Name2
property.value: Final Burial Five Sense Down

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Five Sense Down: Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield as the 4th card from the top of their deck horizontal instead. ■ When your opponent adds a horizontal card in their deck to their hand, they lose the game. ■ Your opponent can't look at or rearrange the order of their deck. ■ When this creature leaves, your opponent shuffles their deck. TWINPACT ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures. Your opponent puts it horizontally as the 4th card from the top of their deck. ■ Put this card.

(The stack is still considered one shield.) ■ Whenever one of your opponent's creatures attacks or blocks, your opponent chooses one of their creatures and taps it.
